Notes: A toy train that consists of at least one segment. It moves on a set path and it randomly creates a whistling sound effect. The individual segments are also affected by gravity, so they will rotate accordingly.

Obj_arg0.Name: Train Segments
Obj_arg0.Description: The number of train parts except the main car that should be created. Default is 3.

Obj_arg1.Name: Speed
Obj_arg1.Description: The rate at which the train moves. Default is 5.

Rail.Description: Defines the path that it moves on.
